key_risks: Securities law violations and ongoing class-action lawsuits
Supply chain disruptions impacting component availability and sales
High competition from larger players like Cisco and Juniper Networks
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities, including exposure to the Clop MOVEit cyberattack
Operational challenges from integrating acquired businesses
controversies: Multiple class-action lawsuits alleging securities law violations
Data breaches exposing vulnerabilities in cybersecurity
Layoffs and operational adjustments due to supply chain disruptions
environmental_issues: Commitment to reducing environmental impact through energy-efficient product designs
social_issues: Layoffs due to supply chain disruptions
Dependence on channel partners creating vulnerability in relationships
governance_issues: Potential breaches of fiduciary duties by officers and directors
Challenges in integrating acquired businesses like Aerohive Networks and Brocade’s Data Center Networking Business
